column1: >>Chinese scientists working on a COVID-19 vaccine have told Sky News they are "99%" sure it will be effective. >>Sinovac, a Beijing-based biotech company, currently has its coronavirus vaccine in stage 2 trials, with more than 1,000 volunteers participating. Time will tell.
Coronavirus vaccine could be ready by October, claims Pfizer CEO
Immunity to coronavirus may be far more widespread than thought

For the first time in 48 years scored the Singapore Airlines in its last financial year a loss 212 million Singapore dollars due to a coronavirus crisis. In the previous financial year earned the carrier 683 million Singapore dollars. Even so, it is an outstanding achievement
